means: 火绒箱，易燃物，潜伏着暴乱或战争危险的人

sentence.Network_en: You have got your money. Now, give me the tinderbox.
sentence.Network_cn: “你已经得到你所要的钱了. 现在, 把我的火绒箱给我. ”

sentence.Network_en: He took the money and the tinderbox and went to a town.
sentence.Network_cn: 士兵带着钱以及火绒箱走到一座城镇.

sentence.Network_en: Referred to the crowded prison as a tinderbox of suppressed violence.
sentence.Network_cn: 把拥挤的监狱称作一个''.'装满'.''了被压制的暴力的火药''.'筒'. ''.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 英语新词汇与常用词汇的翻译 _ 上海疯狂英语... ... tinder 易燃物 tinderbox 易燃物 tindery 易燃的.
火绒盒(tinderbox) - 用来毁灭路障或破坏投石机。一桶水可以熄灭火焰。
...顶楼，在银行的附近有几个原木(Log)，如果玩家有火绒箱(Tinderbox)，可以生起火堆来煮熟食物，同时，升起一个火堆能够得到40 …

entry.def: If you say that a situation is a tinderbox, you mean that it is very tense and something dangerous or unpleasant is likely to happen very soon.

means.word_mean: 1. a dangerous state of affairs; a situation that is a potential source of violence;

sentences.sentence: "the Balkans are the tinderbox of Europe"

auth_sentence.content: Tinderbox is a rollicking, demanding listen.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Tinderbox is a rollicking, demanding listen.

auth_sentence.content: Only a fraction have returned, and until Sudan and South Sudan can agree on who this area belongs to, it will remain a tinderbox.
auth_sentence.res_content: Only a fraction have returned, and until Sudan and South Sudan can agree on who this area belongs to, it will remain a tinderbox.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Only a fraction have returned, and until Sudan and South Sudan can agree on who this area belongs to, it will remain a tinderbox.

auth_sentence.content: For more than a century, the world has worried that the Balkans were a tinderbox.
auth_sentence.res_content: For more than a century, the world has worried that the Balkans were a tinderbox.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: For more than a century, the world has worried that the Balkans were a tinderbox.
